menu.desc: A feature rich terminal UI file transfer
menu.author: About the author

intro.caption: A feature rich terminal UI file transfer and explorer with support for SCP/SFTP/FTP
intro.versionAlert: termscp 0.6.1 is NOW out! Download it from

handy.title: Handy UI
handy.body: Explore and operate on the remote and on the local machine file system with a handy UI.

crossPlatform.title: Cross platform
crossPlatform.body: Runs on Windows, MacOS, Linux and FreeBSD

customizable.title: Customizable
customizable.body: Customize the file explorer, the UI and many other parameters...

bookmarks.title: Bookmarks
bookmarks.body: Connect to your favourite hosts through built-in bookmarks and recent connections

security.title: Security first
security.body: Save your passwords into your operating system key vault

performance.title: Eye on performance
performance.body: termscp has been developed keeping an eye on performance to prevent high cpu usage
